Shoot

York's Independent Shops

By Iza Bienkowska

York is a city of many small businesses that never fail to amaze their visitors. We present to you a selection of the most interesting, original and beautiful independent shops in the city, both viral and less known (but not less attractive!). Who knows, maybe youâ€™ll find a new shop to visit next time you're in town!

Campus Ghosts

By Iza Bienkowska

York is considered the most haunted city in the world. It is said to have around 140 ghosts, each with their own history. You can see a small girl in a window of the house behind York Minster, or meet a monk in St. Maryâ€™s Abbey. Even pubs are haunted here, with the Golden Fleece taking the lead! Not convinced? Go for a night walk in the city and see for yourself! There are over 500 recorded hauntings in York, maybe you'll be lucky as well... Meanwhile, we present to you our very own ghosts on campus! Models: Isabella Edwards, Zoe Golds-Banyard, Adeline Coupe

90's Revival

The 90's a time of great music, culture and style? Take a look back at the comfortable hoodies and neon windbreakers that characterised this era of fashion

The Summer Ball

Be swept away by sleek and stylish evening gowns for all special occasions

Minimalist Fashion

An effortless ensemble of simple minimalist fashion, neutral colours and modern silhouettes

The Urban Wear Edit

Muted tones of track suits, vest tops, leggings and slouchy jackets; sportswear that's worn outside of the gym

A stroll through the 60s

Simple elegant clothing from a previous era

Autumn Ardour

The warm hues of the autumn leaves set off the rich tones in the clothing for this autumnal photoshoot

The shoot embraces an edgier side to vintage fashion

Adorned

The shoot goes bohemian, embracing Adorned's unique and upcycled pieces

Simply Ethical

Inspired by Harper and Carr's unique designs, the shoot explores minimalist concepts and sustainability in fashion.

A Winter Wonderland

Sumptuous suedes, luxurious faux-furs and tasteful tweed characterise our winter-inspired shoot.
